news.title: Nasdaq Hits Record Highs on Tech Earnings Boost
news.summary: The Nasdaq Composite Index reached new all-time highs on Monday as strong earnings from major tech companies like Apple and Microsoft drove investor optimism. The tech-heavy index climbed over 1% in early trading, outpacing the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average.

news.title: Crypto Stocks Surge as Bitcoin Hits $60K for First Time in 2026
news.summary: Shares of cryptocurrency-related companies like Coinbase, MicroStrategy, and Riot Blockchain jumped on Monday as the price of Bitcoin breached the $60,000 mark for the first time this year. The renewed interest in digital assets has fueled a rally across the crypto ecosystem.

news.title: Retail Investors Drive Meme Stock Frenzy in 2026
news.summary: Shares of so-called meme stocks like GameStop and AMC Entertainment have seen a resurgence in 2026 as retail investors continue to drive speculative trading. Industry analysts attribute the renewed interest to a new generation of day traders utilizing social media platforms to coordinate their stock purchases.

news.title: Global Stocks Mixed as Investors Weigh Earnings, Fed Policy
news.summary: Global stock markets traded mixed on Monday as investors assessed the latest corporate earnings reports and the potential for further interest rate hikes by the Federal Reserve. While some sectors like technology performed well, concerns about inflation and economic growth kept overall market sentiment cautious.
